templates.content: Each monthly box is a carefully curated collection of 5+ premium grilling and BBQ products, including barbecue sauces, dry rubs, marinades, spices, hot sauces, and other grilling surprises we know you'll love. Remember to scan the QR code inside your box to unlock the full experience, including bonus recipes, grilling tips, video content, and exclusive deals and discounts from the suppliers!

If you have a piece of content you'd like featured on our website and promoted on our social media accounts, please review our UGC Terms here:  https://www.grillmastersclub.com/pages/terms-of-service and email the content to social@grillmastersclub.com.

templates.name: Military discount

templates.content: The Ultimate BBQ Experience is a monthly subscription and subscriptions are set to autorenew. However, you can pause, cancel or downgrade the box frequency at any time. Autorenewal (recurring billing) occurs on the 1st or 15th of the month (depending on when you placed your first order) in which you receive the final box of your subscription order. Simply put, if you're a month-to-month subscriber, you'll be billed monthly. If you purchase a 3-month auto-renewing subscription, you'll be billed every three months.
templates.name: How does recurring billing and the subscription plan work?

templates.name: Customer Support

templates.content: We offer free shipping on all domestic orders.
templates.name: Free Shipping

templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://www.grillmastersclub.com/policies/refund-policy
templates.name: Return Policy

templates.content:
Your first box ships within 72 hours. Subsequent boxes will ship on or around the 9th or 23rd of the following month, depending on when your first box ships. Subscription orders received from the 1st to 15th of each month get placed in the batch that ships on the 9th; subscription orders received from the 16th - 31st of each month get placed in the batch that ships on the 23rd.

Once your box has been packed and assigned a shipping label, you'll receive tracking information via email so you can monitor the status of your delivery.
templates.name: Shipping Time
